snippet: With a little organization and some careful time management, working from home can be as productive as working at the office.
abstract: Eilene Zimmerman Career Couch column holds that with proper organization and time management, working from home can be as productive as working at an office.
lead_paragraph: With a little organization and some careful time management, working from home can be as productive as working at the office.

headline.seo: Home Office Requires a Businesslike Attitude
headline.main: Working From Home, Without the Sideshows
headline.print_headline: Working From Home, Without the Sideshows
